name: Sujimon: Trading Card Game
description:
The best card game!

Collect cards, get rare monsters, and fight against mighty opponents!

Every round, open a new card pack and receive new monster cards! Square off against rivals! Every monster has an element. Choose your champion, but beware! Some elements are more effective against others!

Unleash a water demon against a fire beast, or take your chances with the raw, physical power of your monster against a new opponent! Create a powerful deck, choose wisely, and wreak havoc upon increasingly mightier foes!

- 100+ monsters to discover, collect, and fight against!
- Easy to play, yet deep strategic gameplay!
- Increasingly challenging, bone-crushing, action filled fights!
- Mighty rivals that won't let go! Face your nemesis in future matches!
